title: Interpretation of engagement in a dream for one girl

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an engagement in a dream for a single girl: An unmarried girl if she dreams that someone is proposing to her, and this girl in the dream looks elegant and her fiancé is handsome. It is an indication of this girl’s emotional need and her closeness to someone who loves and includes her. If the unmarried girl sees in her dream someone who wants her father to marry Or her guardian. It may indicate a desire to get close to this person in reality. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is engaged to someone she loves in reality, this indicates how much the girl loves that man. Seeing an unmarried girl engaged to her in a dream, and that The engagement has taken place, meaning marriage to a handsome and respectable man. When a single girl sees that she is engaged to someone she already knows. This may indicate that there are some difficulties and problems that are difficult to solve. These problems may be with a relative or family, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about engagement in The dream and its meaning in detail. Interpretation of seeing an engagement in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman dreams that she is engaged to someone she does not know. This indicates a lot of goodness and abundant food that she will receive in the coming days, God willing. When a married woman sees that she is engaged to her husband, this indicates her husband’s love for her and his respect for her. For her. Ibn Sirin says that when he sees a married woman in a dream, she is engaged to a man other than her husband. This indicates that he will obtain a lot of money in the near future, God willing. Perhaps this dream is an indication that the problems between her and her husband are about to end, God willing. This dream may indicate the goodness and blessing that this woman will have in her life, God willing. Ibn Sirin says in the interpretation of visions that when he sees a woman in a dream, he suggests marrying someone. This vision shows the love of the husband’s family for her, and God knows best. If the dreamer has a daughter At the age of marriage, this may indicate that he will be engaged to someone, God willing. If her daughter was previously engaged and this woman witnessed this vision, this indicates that the date of her marriage is imminent, God willing. Seeing an engagement in a married woman’s dream is evidence of tremendous goodness. And livelihood and happiness, which are praiseworthy dreams. Interpretation of the vision of getting engaged in a dream for a man and its meaning. When a man dreams that he is engaged to an unmarried girl and knows this in reality, this indicates the achievement of goals and dreams, God willing. If a man dreams that he is proposing to a girl he does not know, this may mean that His life is near, and God knows best. Perhaps this vision indicates the facilitation of some of the things that he desires to achieve and desires to achieve, God willing. Many scholars interpreted the interpretation of a married man’s vision as meaning that he has engaged in an engagement with a prostitute. This is evidence of this man’s evil ways, and God knows best. If he sees If a man sees that he is engaged to a girl he does not want or want, this indicates that he is coming to do something against his will, and God knows best. When a man sees that he is engaged to a girl of extraordinary beauty, these visions are considered good dreams, because they indicate that what is desired will be achieved, God willing. If The man saw in his dream that he was engaged to a girl from the M family

title: Interpretation of a quarrel with a husband in a dream: Seeing a quarrel with my husband in a dream

preview.html: I dreamed that I was arguing with my husband, my fiancé, my lover, and my ex-wife, single, married, pregnant, divorced, and more with Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of the dispute in a dream. When the dreamer quarrels with one of his parents in a dream, this is a sign of his urgent need for tenderness and attention more than before. If he quarrels The dreamer is with a stranger or even a neighbor in a dream, this indicates the life of vanity and fun that he lives. As for quarreling with the dead in the dream, it reflects the many problems and difficulties that the dreamer faces in reality and the difficulty of getting rid of them. If the dreamer sees himself arguing with someone close to him, Like his mother, father, and brother, the dream was evidence of disputes between family members in reality. As for the fighting that accompanies beatings in the dream, it symbolizes negative energy within the dreamer that he cannot get rid of and get rid of in reality. A dreamer who sees a dispute in a dream means that he is in need Desperate for kindness and tenderness in reality. As for a quarrel in a dream between friends, it indicates the strong relationship that unites them in reality and means that each of them strongly supports the other in reality. But if the dreamer sees that he is arguing in a dream with a friend with whom he has a disagreement in reality, then the dream It indicates that the date of reconciliation between them is approaching. Dreaming of an argument with a dead person means that the dreamer is going through a major crisis in reality and needs to review himself, his actions, and his intentions in reality. Interpretation of a dream of a quarrel between spouses. A quarrel between spouses in a dream shows the differences they face in reality, and this dream also reflects Her discomfort with this situation and her inability to deal with it in reality. This dream also reflects the negative energy charges that the couple seeks to discharge in reality, but they do not succeed. A woman’s quarrel with her husband in a dream symbolizes her inability to confront him in reality and oppose his ideas and decisions. Ibn Sirin dreams of a quarrel with her husband. Interpretation of a quarrel with her mother-in-law in a dream. A woman’s quarrel with her mother-in-law is not considered a good dream, as it means that the bride does not have pure feelings towards her husband’s mother, and the dispute between them in the dream comes to help the dreamer get rid of the negative energy that controls her because of her unsuccessful relationships. With the other party and because it is unable to build real forms in reality. In general, this dream means that the dreamer has emptied the negative charge in it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about eggs with yolks

preview.html: But through this article, we will list all the interpretations of seeing eggs with two yolks, and here are more than one interpreter site. Interpretation of a dream of eggs with two yolks in a dream for one girl. He referred to the interpretation of a dream about eggs with two yolks in a dream for one girl. It is one of the symbols that indicate goodness and abundance of livelihood thanks to God Almighty. And seeing eggs being broken and two yolks emerging from them in one girl’s dream. The vision was a bad omen, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. And in the event that he saw him eating eggs while they were immature, and there were two yolks in one girl’s dream. The vision indicates failure in certain matters related to the vision. And God is Most High and Most Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees that she is eating eggs, and they are with two yolks and they are ripe in the dream. The vision may mean that there is a lot of good news that may cover her in the future, God willing. It symbolizes seeing the egg yolks and they have matured, and the girl ate them unchanged. A married woman in a dream. The vision can bring him a lot of goodness and blessings that he will receive in the coming days, thanks to God Almighty. A dream about eggs shows two yolks and the shape of the yolk has an unpleasant smell in a single girl’s dream. On some matters related to the state of insight, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation Dream of seeing eggs. Interpretation of seeing eggs with two yolks in a dream for a married woman. Seeing eggs with two yolks indicates the time of frying them in a married woman’s dream. Statement of the news that she receives through work or obtaining a job, whether for her or for her husband. What if he sees that he is frying two eggs in a married woman’s dream? It is a sign of liberation from the economic crises that were in the life of the visionary. And if he saw that he was climbing on eggs, and there were two yolks in a married woman’s dream. The vision showed an improvement in certain aspects of insight. About seeing eggs breaking and two yolks coming out of them in a married woman’s dream. The vision may indicate a financial loss to the viewer. The vision of eating eggs, which were immature, can be interpreted in a married woman’s dream. It is a sign of illicit money, and God knows best. Two saffron eggs are collected in a married woman’s dream. The competition shows that the dreamer is distinguished By providing services to others without any compensation. In these interpretations we see that eggs with two yolks in a married woman’s dream. It is good news that brings goodness to us and her family, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about eggs with two yolks in a dream about a man and its meaning. There is no doubt that seeing eggs with two yolks in a married man’s dream It is finding a new job or a job that he was really looking for. And if he sees that he is trying to buy two eggs with yolks in a dream with a married man. This is one of the signs that indicate that the married man seeks to provide the good that he brings to his family. Whereas if he sees that he is frying Eggs with two yolks in a dream with marriage. He will obtain a lot of good and abundant money by the grace of Almighty God. What if he sees that he is boiling two eggs with two yolks and eats them in a married dream. The vision showed that acquiring money is easy and convenient, God willing. The vision of giving eggs with two yolks to the wife can be interpreted In the dream of a married man. However, his wife will give birth to him two sons and two daughters, and all of this is by the command of God Almighty

title: Interpretation of a dream about feces for a married woman

preview.html: When he sees him, he searches for an interpretation of the vision to find out whether it is good or bad, and in this article we will learn about the interpretation of this vision through the website gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing a chair in a dream for a single girl. Commentators believe that the stool in the dream is for a single girl. It indicates her death and her worries. And her sorrows in reality, God willing. Also, excrement in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates her purity and good reputation. An unmarried girl gets rid of excrement in the bathroom, meaning she gets rid of the person she was going to marry because he was not suitable for her. It is an unpleasant vision to see the same A girl in a dream. She empties her feces in front of people, as she sees that she will fall into a scandal. Because of her bad behavior, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. An unmarried girl touching feces in a dream is evidence of her financial deprivation. Seeing a single girl touching the seat of others. This means that they have evil people associated with them. In reality, he should stay away from them. When a single girl walks on the excrement of others. Evidence of her mistakes in reality. Diarrhea is evidence of wasting money. When an unmarried girl defecates on her bed in a dream, this is evidence that she has committed a mistake. See also: Interpretation of a vision A chair in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing a chair in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in her sleep defecating in front of people without fear. This means not being afraid, to do all the things she wants without blame. A married woman defecates in public who disobeys and commits immorality without fear of God. This vision It is a message from God to return from her wrong actions and ask for repentance. Feces in front of people in a married woman’s dream means that he reveals to her a secret that she was hiding. A good vision in a married woman’s dream is seeing her child’s feces in a dream. It indicates the nearness of pregnancy and that God will bless her with a child. It is believed Ibn Sirin said that feces in a married woman’s dream means happy news. Seeing her husband’s feces in a dream is evidence of a happy married life. Black feces in a married woman’s dream means that she will be exposed to trouble. Feces on a married woman’s dress in a dream indicates committing sins. This must come back. A married woman turns to God and repents. Interpretation of seeing a chair in a dream about a man and its meaning. When a man defecates in his dream in front of people, a sign of scandal is revealed to him. Excrement in a married man’s dream indicates money from a forbidden source. A man who defecates in a dream means that he will be saved from a crisis that was about to occur. In it. A man defecates in the toilet in his dream. Good news about the end of his problems at work. Seeing a man in a dream defecating on his clothes. It is spending on what does not benefit him, but rather harms him. Seeing a man in his dream with feces in the street is evidence of his behavior that violates the law. Seeing a man In his dream about a child’s chair, it is good news for good and ample nutrition. Stool in a man’s dream on his hand, then he got rid of it, is evidence that he got rid of his problems and sorrows. Stool in a man’s dream may indicate that he is sick with a serious illness, and God knows best. Stool in a man’s dream may indicate that he is sick with a serious illness, and God knows best. Stool in a child’s chair may indicate A man's dream indicates that he is suffering from obsessive-compulsive disorder. It shows that the divine is living from a forbidden source. When...

title: The 8 most famous interpretations of seeing sunrise in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing the sunrise in a dream? Elements of kingship or indicating the father. What does it mean to see a bright sunrise? Indicates an extensive diet. What is the interpretation of watching the sunrise from the west? Evidence of the death of the fetus. What does it mean for a man to see the sun coming out of his head? Evidence of The good that he obtains. Interpretation of the sunrise for the merchant? Proof of profit from his trade. Interpretation of the dream of sunrise by Ibn Sirin. The sunrise in a dream is a sign of the king or indicates the father. So, seeing the sun in general in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s position in work. Then whoever sees the sun bowing to him in In a dream, this indicates that he will obtain the rights of the lost person. Then seeing a person in a dream worshiping the sun indicates committing disobedience and sins. The sunrise in a dream is a sign of the beginning of a new life free of problems. Then the sunrise indicates achieving goals and achieving ambitions. Then seeing The sunrise in the dream and the light was small, this is an indication of the spread of the disease. A dream about the sunrise from the west is evidence of the death of the fetus if the woman is pregnant. Seeing the sunrise in clear light, this indicates the ample sustenance that the dreamer will obtain. Seeing a dream about the sunrise For single people, if a girl sees the sun rising from a house next to her, this indicates her marriage to a strange man she does not know. Then, if the girl sees in a dream that she is walking behind the setting sun, this means that the term is approaching. After that, if the girl sees in a dream that she is talking to the sun, then this It indicates that she will soon marry a man of high status. Interpretation of a dream about sunrise for a married woman: Seeing a married woman in a dream at sunrise indicates the stability of her married life. Then if a married woman sees that her husband in a dream is trying to catch the sun, this indicates that he will get a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about sunrise for a man: If an unmarried young man sees the sun in his house, this indicates his marriage to a girl in the family. Then the man sees the sun in a dream coming out of a house next to him, this indicates his marriage to a foreign girl whom he does not know. The sunrise in a merchant’s dream is evidence of He made a profit from his trade and it will be a source of great livelihood. Then if a person sees a sunset in a dream and that sunset follows, he will die soon. Then a man who sees the sun coming out of his head in a dream, this is evidence of the goodness that he gets. But if it comes out of his feet, this is evidence that he He has gained goodness and money, but from agriculture or crops that he has. Joy in a dream. Seeing grilled fish. Shrimps in a dream. Lentils in a dream. Seeing raw fish. Suicide in a dream. Vomiting in a dream. Feces in a dream. A date in a dream. A snake in a dream. Someone you love several times. Interpretation of seeing dead people. Ants in a dream. Jeans in a dream.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone breaking into a house in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a stranger breaking into the house in a dream. title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a girl getting engaged to a well-known person?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of engagement for one girl. Interpretation of a dream of engagement of an unmarried girl by a familiar person. It is one of the dreams that can be repeated often in a girl’s dream and she feels that happiness is approaching her. This dream makes her search for its meaning and connotations until her heart calms down and calms down. Interpretation of the dream of engagement by a known person can be Seeing this dream in her dream means that she is always busy and thinking about her desire to get engaged, and her thoughts could be focused on a specific person that she wants to connect with. If he has not thought much about it, but has professional and academic ambitions that he wants to pursue, good news of a new position or reward will come soon. Great. Some scholars have said that the vision expresses the time of her approaching engagement and that happiness will be her share with this person who asked to marry her. If he knows this person and does not consider her a wife, then he respects him, cares for him, and wishes him happiness in reality, and his vision is evidence that he It occupies a very important place in his work. Being engaged in a dream by a well-known person. If she hides her love for this person and does not believe that he feels it, then seeing her is a sign that he reciprocates the same feelings and wants to marry her and the coming days will bring her more joy and happiness. Interpretation of a dream about engaging someone Moin, but she actually hates him and cannot bear to deal with him, here she is expected to face many problems in a row and she has to consult someone older than her family so that she does not have to deal with her problems. Alone. The engagement of a famous person in a dream with Ibn Sirin. The respected researcher said that this vision is the result of the girl really loving this person and having a strong desire to be associated with him, but she does not dare to declare her love for him because of her shy nature. But if she does not really love this person, Unfortunately, she suffers from a delay in achieving her ambitions, which she has been striving for for a long time, but she must continue to strive and strive and never despair. Her vision can also indicate that this person she saw will soon receive good news and that he is one of the people close to her. If this person is already married, but she sees him proposing to her in a dream, then there is a problem she will get into and she will find no one to help her except him. As for the girl who was previously engaged to a specific person but dreams of another person, this is evidence of a lack of understanding between her and her fiancé and that she wants to cancel the engagement. But she faces the obstacle of her parents. And not condemning them for the reasons for the cancellation. Interpretation of a dream about the engagement of a loved one to Ibn Sirin: In the eyes of Ibn Sirin, the vision expresses many things, including excellence in life in general, or her true happiness with her future husband. Here is the explanation according to the details of the vision: If the girl chose to enroll in a certain university, the parents were not satisfied with her at first, but she was determined with confidence in her abilities, considering that evidence of her success in this field that she chose for herself, and that she would achieve her ambitions and be a source of pride for all family members. But if the girl really likes that particular person and wants to hook up with him, there is a good chance she will propose to him

title: Learn about the interpretation of losing a shoe in a dream from Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of a dream about losing a white shoe, the interpretation of a dream about losing a shoe, wearing another shoe, and losing a yellow shoe in a dream.

preview.html: Losing shoes in a dream. There is no doubt that losing any item makes us very confused and we think about many possibilities and search a lot for them. Therefore, this feeling is one of the worst things we go through because we do not know the location of this item. Just as shoes are necessary, they are our companions on every trip. So get ready to see losing shoes, one of the important dreams that has multiple interpretations and which we will learn about throughout the article. Losing shoes in a dream. What is losing shoes in a dream? Which - Interpretation of a dream about losing shoes leads to a feeling of loneliness as a result of losing a friend or relative, which makes the dreamer feel sad. And anxiety, and he cannot escape from it except by praying to God Almighty, and then he escapes from this bad feeling as... As quickly as possible. If the dreamer loses his shoes in the sea, this indicates that his wife will be exposed to some physical problems that will make her unable to do any work, so he should help her and pray to God Almighty to end the fatigue and pain. Which he feels soon. If the dreamer takes off his shoes when entering a place without anyone taking them, then this is not a bad dream, but rather evidence of his progress in his work and his reaching higher positions in the coming period. But if he does not find the single shoe and continues to search for it in vain, this leads to Losing his money makes him suffer a lot in his work, so he must search for the cause of the problem and treat it. Immediately. The vision also leads to recurring problems with his wife that make him think about divorcing her and not wanting to return to her, but he must be patient and not be reckless in his thinking until his Lord saves him from any harm. Losing a shoe in a dream by Ibn Sirin Our great scholar Ibn Sirin believes that losing shoes One of the unfavorable dreams that lead to distress and distress, and as for finding it, this completely changes its meaning and indicates the solution of all problems and a life of happiness and stability. The vision expresses the dreamer’s happiness in his life, but it does not continue as he wants, as his life takes another path that he did not want, but He should be satisfied with what his Lord has given him and be among all those who are always grateful and grateful. Praise. If the shoe is tight on the dreamer, this indicates a financial crisis that will affect him, and loss means that he will face a problem that will make him suffer a loss that will push him to the judgments and fears that he did. If he approaches his Lord, nothing will harm him no matter what happens. If the dreamer’s son’s shoes or any other child’s shoes are lost, this indicates the child’s need for care from his parents so that he grows up properly and does not suffer from psychological problems that will harm him later. Losing shoes is considered a sign among people. Unfavorable, as the vision suggests that the dreamer will be exposed to malicious words about him that will make him afraid to be in front of others at any time. To get the correct interpretation, conduct a search on Google, the Egyptian dream interpretation site. Losing shoes in a dream for a single woman. Every girl has her own dreams that have occupied her mind since childhood. However, we find that this vision leads her to not achieve an important wish that she always wanted. However, we find that missing opportunities does not mean...

title: Interpretation of seeing slippers in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing slippers in a dream or a dream through the website Vision roy2a.com. Seeing slippers in a dream has many meanings. Seeing slippers can be a sign of good or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing slippers in a dream, depending on the state and circumstances of the viewer, and what if a man or woman is single, married, or pregnant. Today, through a vision website, we will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing slippers in a dream, based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn Sirin. Kathir, Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing slippers in a dream? Seeing slippers in a dream indicates the fortuneteller’s failure in his marriage. Seeing a woman alone buying slippers in a dream indicates her marriage to a poor man. Seeing singles in a dream indicates his marriage to a woman of his Including children. Seeing slippers being stolen in a dream indicates that the dreamer is going through a difficult period full of worries and sorrows. Seeing losing slippers in a dream indicates that the dreamer is separated from someone he loves. See also: Interpretation of seeing Sidra Al-Muntaha in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing slippers in a dream for a single woman? A vision in a dream One Slipper It signifies the end of all worries and anxieties in her life. Seeing women alone wearing slippers in a dream indicates many positive changes in her life. Seeing women alone with many slippers in a dream indicates her pursuit of achieving her ambitions and goals in life. Seeing women alone wearing slippers in a dream shows She did not follow the right path in her life. Seeing a woman alone in red slippers in a dream is impulsive and makes quick decisions. See also: Interpretation of seeing a deceased person wearing black shoes in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing slippers in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a married woman making slippers in a dream says that he is going through a period Difficult, full of worries and sorrow. Seeing a married woman taking off her slippers in a dream indicates relieving her anxiety and removing anxiety. Seeing a married woman wearing black slippers in a dream indicates that promising things will happen in her life that will make her feel happy and joyful. Seeing a married woman taking off her slippers in a dream indicates that she will have some disagreements. With her husband in the next few days. Seeing a married woman buying slippers in a dream bodes well for her and her family. What is the interpretation of seeing slippers in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream taking off her slippers indicates the end of all problems and crises in her life. Seeing a pregnant woman wearing slippers in a dream says that she She will give birth in the next few days, but she will be fine after the birth process. See also: Interpretation of seeing shoe repair in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing slippers in a dream for a man? Seeing a man wearing slippers in a dream represents the end of a difficult period in his life. Seeing a man wearing tight slippers in a dream indicates... He has been exposed to many worries and anxieties in his life. Seeing a man taking off his sandals in a dream shows that God will give him a lot of money in the coming season. Seeing a man wearing wide sandals in a dream indicates that he will face...

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a wolf, the interpretation of a dream about a dead wolf, and the interpretation of a dream about hunting a wolf

preview.html: Interpretations of a dream about a wolf: The wolf is considered one of the strongest predatory animals, and therefore pets and people avoid confronting it for fear of its extreme tyranny. When seeing a wolf in a dream, the dreamer feels confused and feels extreme fear of this vision because of the strength of the wolf. In reality and her strong understanding of what is in front of her.. What is the meaning of the interpretation of a dream about a wolf? What are its different meanings for the dreamer? We will explain through our topic. Interpretations of a dream about a wolf What is the interpretation of a dream about a wolf? It is a symbol of the enemy trying to trap the dreamer in reality and deceive him, and its appearance in a dream can indicate many bad things such as the presence of hypocrites or thieves in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a wolf is interpreted in The dream represents a misunderstanding between people, cruelty in treatment, and the presence of many enmities in the dreamer’s life. If one sees himself turning into a wolf in a dream, this indicates two things: the first is that this person will be happy in his life, God willing, and the second indicates that This person will repent to God for some wrongdoing. It is an act. As for seeing a wolf for a woman in general, it is not one of the praiseworthy visions because it indicates the presence of an evil man who is harming her with evil, so she must take care of him. Seeing a dead wolf is one of the good visions for a person because it indicates that the evil and evil that some people conspired against is far away. Hearing a voice A wolf in a dream indicates that some enemies have united against the dreamer to harm him, so God must seek help from him to deal with these individuals. What is the interpretation of a dream about a wolf by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin believes that if a person sees a wolf in a dream, this indicates that he has wronged some people in his life. He accused them of lying. A dream of a wolf in a house indicates the theft that the people of this house will be subjected to, and it is most likely that this thief will appear to the dreamer, and if the wolf is tied up, this is a sign that the person will get what he wants because he is strong against his enemy. Hunting a wolf shows a lot of goodness and joy that will enter into the life of The dreamer, God willing, and the opposite will happen if a person escapes from a wolf, because the matter carries some problems and obstacles that will occur in him. As for killing the wolf and getting rid of it in a dream, it is evidence that the dreamer is a person who is approaching God and wants to attain His Paradise and avoid disobeying Him. The head of a wolf in a dream A good sign for the dreamer, because it confirms that he holds an important position that raises his value and status among people. Why do you wake up confused when you find your interpretation? Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site from Google. Interpretation of a dream of a wolf for a single woman. A dream about a wolf for a single woman indicates that there is a man trying to reach her in her life, but he can catch She has a lot of mischief, so she must be patient and think carefully before dealing with him. This man can be very cunning, like a real wolf in his actions, and this girl should think about her feelings first, because he may be unrealistic and this marriage will hurt her a lot. Seeing a wolf for a single woman explains many things to her, including that there are people dealing with situations that will cause her psychological and physical harm, so she must be careful with them. The girl who
